task_1.peak_month_analysis: December showed the highest sales due to holiday shopping season, with consumers purchasing gifts and taking advantage of year-end promotions. Additionally, winter seasonal items saw increased demand during this period.

task_2.buying_pattern_prediction: With moderate inflation and relatively strong consumer confidence, customers will likely prioritize value-oriented purchases while still maintaining spending on essential items. We anticipate increased price sensitivity leading to higher sales of private label products and moderate growth in mid-tier merchandise, while luxury goods may see slower growth as consumers become more selective with discretionary spending.
